verses.verse: Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to his anointed, <S%H4899><s%> to Cyrus, <S%H3566><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> I have held, <S%H2388><s%> to subdue <S%H7286><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him; and I will loose <S%H6605><s%> the loins <S%H4975><s%> of kings, <S%H4428><s%> to open <S%H6605><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him the two leaved <S%H1817><s%> gates; <S%H1817><s%> and the gates <S%H8179><s%> shall not be shut; <S%H5462><s%>

I will go <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, and make the crooked <S%H1921><s%> places straight: <S%H3474><s%> I will break <S%H7665><s%> in pieces the gates <S%H1817><s%> of brass, <S%H5154><s%> and cut <S%H1438><s%> in sunder the bars <S%H1280><s%> of iron: <S%H1270><s%>

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> you the treasures <S%H214><s%> of darkness, <S%H2822><s%> and hidden <S%H4301><s%> riches <S%H4301><s%> of secret <S%H4565><s%> places, that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that I, the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which call <S%H7121><s%> you by your name, <S%H8034><s%> am the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

For Jacob <S%H3290><s%> my servant's <S%H5650><s%> sake, <S%H4616><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> my elect, <S%H972><s%> I have even called <S%H7121><s%> you by your name: <S%H8034><s%> I have surnamed <S%H3655><s%> you, though you have not known <S%H3045><s%> me.

I am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and there is none <S%H369><s%> else, <S%H5750><s%> there is no <S%H369><s%> God <S%H430><s%> beside <S%H2108><s%> me: I girded <S%H247><s%> you, though you have not known <S%H3045><s%> me:

That they may know <S%H3045><s%> from the rising <S%H4217><s%> of the sun, <S%H8121><s%> and from the west, <S%H4628><s%> that there is none <S%H657><s%> beside <S%H1107><s%> me. I am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and there is none <S%H369><s%> else. <S%H5750><s%>

I form <S%H3335><s%> the light, <S%H216><s%> and create <S%H1254><s%> darkness: <S%H2822><s%> I make <S%H6213><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> and create <S%H1254><s%> evil: <S%H7451><s%> I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> all these <S%H428><s%> things.

Drop <S%H7491><s%> down, you heavens, <S%H8064><s%> from above, <S%H4605><s%> and let the skies <S%H7834><s%> pour <S%H5140><s%> down righteousness: <S%H6664><s%> let the earth <S%H776><s%> open, <S%H6605><s%> and let them bring <S%H6509><s%> forth <S%H6509><s%> salvation, <S%H3468><s%> and let righteousness <S%H6666><s%> spring <S%H6779><s%> up together; <S%H3162><s%> I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have created <S%H1254><s%> it.

Woe <S%H1945><s%> to him that strives <S%H7378><s%> with his Maker! <S%H3335><s%> Let the potsherd <S%H2789><s%> strive with the potsherds <S%H2789><s%> of the earth. <S%H127><s%> Shall the clay <S%H2563><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to him that fashions <S%H3335><s%> it, What <S%H4100><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> you? or your work, <S%H6467><s%> He has no <S%H369><s%> hands? <S%H3027><s%>

Woe <S%H1945><s%> to him that said <S%H559><s%> to his father, <S%H1><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> beget <S%H3205><s%> you? or to the woman, <S%H802><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> have you brought <S%H2342><s%> forth? <S%H2342><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the Holy <S%H6918><s%> One of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and his Maker, <S%H3335><s%> Ask <S%H7592><s%> me of things to come <S%H857><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> my sons, <S%H1121><s%> and concerning <S%H5921><s%> the work <S%H6467><s%> of my hands <S%H3027><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> you me.

I have made <S%H6213><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and created <S%H1254><s%> man <S%H120><s%> on it: I, even my hands, <S%H3027><s%> have stretched <S%H5186><s%> out the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their host <S%H6635><s%> have I commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

I have raised <S%H5782><s%> him up in righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and I will direct <S%H3474><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his ways: <S%H1870><s%> he shall build <S%H1129><s%> my city, <S%H5892><s%> and he shall let go <S%H7971><s%> my captives, <S%H1546><s%> not for price <S%H4242><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> reward, <S%H7810><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> The labor <S%H3018><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and merchandise <S%H5505><s%> of Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> and of the Sabeans, <S%H5436><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of stature, <S%H4060><s%> shall come <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to you, and they shall be yours: they shall come <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you; in chains <S%H2131><s%> they shall come <S%H5674><s%> over, <S%H5674><s%> and they shall fall <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> to you, they shall make supplication <S%H6419><s%> to you, saying, Surely <S%H389><s%> God <S%H410><s%> is in you; and there is none <S%H369><s%> else, <S%H5750><s%> there is no <S%H657><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>
Truly <S%H403><s%> you are a God <S%H410><s%> that hide <S%H5641><s%> yourself, O God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the Savior. <S%H3467><s%>

They shall be ashamed, <S%H954><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> confounded, <S%H3637><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them: they shall go <S%H1980><s%> to confusion <S%H3639><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> that are makers <S%H2796><s%> of idols. <S%H6736><s%>

But Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be saved <S%H3467><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> salvation: <S%H8668><s%> you shall not be ashamed <S%H954><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> confounded <S%H3637><s%> world <S%H5769><s%> without <S%H5769><s%> <S%H5703><s%> end. <S%H5704><s%>

For thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that created <S%H1254><s%> the heavens; <S%H8064><s%> God <S%H430><s%> himself <S%H1931><s%> that formed <S%H3335><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> it; he has established <S%H3559><s%> it, he created <S%H1254><s%> it not in vain, <S%H8414><s%> he formed <S%H3335><s%> it to be inhabited: <S%H3427><s%> I am the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and there is none <S%H369><s%> else. <S%H5750><s%>

I have not spoken <S%H1696><s%> in secret, <S%H5643><s%> in a dark <S%H2822><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%> I said <S%H559><s%> not to the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> Seek <S%H1245><s%> you me in vain: <S%H8414><s%> I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> I declare <S%H5046><s%> things that are right. <S%H4339><s%>

Assemble <S%H6908><s%> yourselves and come; <S%H935><s%> draw near <S%H5066><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> you that are escaped <S%H6412><s%> of the nations: <S%H1471><s%> they have no <S%H3808><s%> knowledge <S%H3045><s%> that set <S%H5375><s%> up the wood <S%H6086><s%> of their graven <S%H6459><s%> image, and pray <S%H6419><s%> to a god <S%H410><s%> that cannot <S%H3808><s%> save. <S%H3467><s%>

Tell <S%H5046><s%> you, and bring <S%H5066><s%> them near; <S%H5066><s%> yes, <S%H637><s%> let them take counsel <S%H3289><s%> together: <S%H3162><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> has declared <S%H8085><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> from ancient <S%H6924><s%> time? who has told <S%H5046><s%> it from that time? <S%H227><s%> have not I the LORD? <S%H3068><s%> and there is no <S%H369><s%> God <S%H430><s%> else <S%H5750><s%> beside <S%H1107><s%> me; a just <S%H6662><s%> God <S%H410><s%> and a Savior; <S%H3467><s%> there is none <S%H369><s%> beside <S%H2108><s%> me.
Look <S%H6437><s%> to me, and be you saved, <S%H3467><s%> all the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%> for I am God, <S%H410><s%> and there is none <S%H369><s%> else. <S%H5750><s%>

I have sworn <S%H7650><s%> by myself, the word <S%H1697><s%> is gone <S%H3318><s%> out of my mouth <S%H6310><s%> in righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> and shall not return, <S%H7725><s%> That to me every <S%H3605><s%> knee <S%H1290><s%> shall bow, <S%H3766><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> shall swear. <S%H7650><s%>

Surely, <S%H389><s%> shall one say, <S%H559><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have I righteousness <S%H6666><s%> and strength: <S%H5797><s%> even to him shall men come; <S%H935><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that are incensed <S%H2734><s%> against him shall be ashamed. <S%H954><s%>
In the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall all <S%H3605><s%> the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> be justified, <S%H6663><s%> and shall glory. <S%H1984><s%>
